_question._questionText: <div>Which of the following statements below are true?</p><p>The advantage of using Pyrex over IFBA BPs is:</div><div></div>
_question._qtiXml: <assessmentItem identifier="" title=""><responseDeclaration identifier="RESPONSE" baseType="identifier" cardinality="single"><correctResponse><value>answerChoice3</value></correctResponse><mapping><mapEntry mapKey="answerChoice1" mappedValue="0" /><mapEntry mapKey="answerChoice2" mappedValue="0" /><mapEntry mapKey="answerChoice3" mappedValue="1" /></mapping></responseDeclaration><outcomeDeclaration identifier="SCORE" baseType="float" cardinality="single"><defaultValue><value>0</value></defaultValue></outcomeDeclaration><itemBody><![CDATA[<div>Which of the following statements below are true?</p><p>The advantage of using Pyrex over IFBA BPs is:</div>]]><choiceInteraction responseIdentifier="RESPONSE" maxChoices="1" shuffle="False"><simpleChoice identifier="answerChoice1">High residual reactivity at the End of Cycle (EOC)</simpleChoice><simpleChoice identifier="answerChoice2">More efficient neutron use</simpleChoice><simpleChoice identifier="answerChoice3">Ease of manufacture</simpleChoice></choiceInteraction><![CDATA[<div></div>]]></itemBody><outcomeDeclaration identifier="FEEDBACK" baseType="identifier" cardinality="single" /><outcomeDeclaration identifier="GENERAL_FEEDBACK" baseType="identifier" cardinality="single" /><responseProcessing><setOutcomeValue identifier="FEEDBACK"><variable identifier="RESPONSE" /></setOutcomeValue><responseCondition><responseIf><isNull><variable identifier="RESPONSE" /></isNull><setOutcomeValue identifier="SCORE"><baseValue baseType="integer">0</baseValue></setOutcomeValue></responseIf><responseElse><setOutcomeValue identifier="SCORE"><mapResponse identifier="RESPONSE" /></setOutcomeValue><responseCondition><responseIf><match><correct identifier="RESPONSE" /><variable identifier="RESPONSE" /></match><setOutcomeValue identifier="GENERAL_FEEDBACK"><baseValue baseType="identifier">CORRECT_FEEDBACK</baseValue></setOutcomeValue></responseIf><responseElse><setOutcomeValue identifier="GENERAL_FEEDBACK"><baseValue baseType="identifier">INCORRECT_FEEDBACK</baseValue></setOutcomeValue></responseElse></responseCondition></responseElse></responseCondition></responseProcessing></assessmentItem>

_question._questionText: <div>Indicate which of the listed below features of gas (Helium) gap in fuel rod design is <u>not true</u>:</div><div></div>
_question._qtiXml: <assessmentItem identifier="" title=""><responseDeclaration identifier="RESPONSE" baseType="identifier" cardinality="single"><correctResponse><value>answerChoice3</value></correctResponse><mapping><mapEntry mapKey="answerChoice1" mappedValue="0" /><mapEntry mapKey="answerChoice2" mappedValue="0" /><mapEntry mapKey="answerChoice3" mappedValue="1" /></mapping></responseDeclaration><outcomeDeclaration identifier="SCORE" baseType="float" cardinality="single"><defaultValue><value>0</value></defaultValue></outcomeDeclaration><itemBody><![CDATA[<div>Indicate which of the listed below features of gas (Helium) gap in fuel rod design is <u>not true</u>:</div>]]><choiceInteraction responseIdentifier="RESPONSE" maxChoices="1" shuffle="False"><simpleChoice identifier="answerChoice1">Counteracts coolant pressure</simpleChoice><simpleChoice identifier="answerChoice2">Provides improved heat transfer</simpleChoice><simpleChoice identifier="answerChoice3">Prevents fuel-cladding interactions</simpleChoice></choiceInteraction><![CDATA[<div></div>]]></itemBody><outcomeDeclaration identifier="FEEDBACK" baseType="identifier" cardinality="single" /><outcomeDeclaration /></setOutcomeValue><responseCondition><responseIf><match><correct identifier="RESPONSE" /><variable identifier="RESPONSE" /></match><setOutcomeValue identifier="GENERAL_FEEDBACK"><baseValue baseType="identifier">CORRECT_FEEDBACK</baseValue></setOutcomeValue></responseIf><responseElse><setOutcomeValue identifier="GENERAL_FEEDBACK"><baseValue baseType="identifier">INCORRECT_FEEDBACK</baseValue></setOutcomeValue></responseElse></responseCondition></responseElse></responseCondition></responseProcessing></assessmentItem>

_question._questionText: <div>Which of the following statements below are true?</p><p>The <img width="21" height="18" src="$ANGEL:UPLOADPATH$MML/2013/01/17/144710_360836.gif" id="img144710_360836.gif" name="img144710_360836.gif" alt="mathml equation" created="2013/01/18" eq="mathml" fontsize="14" appletheight="36" appletwidth="37" mathml="&lt;math&gt;&lt;mrow&gt;&lt;msub&gt;&lt;mrow&gt;&lt;mi&gt;U&lt;/mi&gt;&lt;mi&gt;O&lt;/mi&gt;&lt;/mrow&gt;&lt;mrow&gt;&lt;mn&gt;2&lt;/mn&gt;&lt;/mrow&gt;&lt;/msub&gt;&lt;/mrow&gt;&lt;/math&gt;" onerror="try { makeMml(this) } catch(e) { }" /> fuel is better than Uranium metallic fuel because:</div><div></div>
_question._qtiXml: <assessmentItem identifier="" title=""><responseDeclaration identifier="RESPONSE" baseType="identifier" cardinality="single"><correctResponse><value>answerChoice2</value></correctResponse><mapping><mapEntry mapKey="answerChoice1" mappedValue="0" /><mapEntry mapKey="answerChoice2" mappedValue="1" /><mapEntry mapKey="answerChoice3" mappedValue="0" /></mapping></responseDeclaration><outcomeDeclaration identifier="SCORE" baseType="float" cardinality="single"><defaultValue><value>0</value></defaultValue></outcomeDeclaration><itemBody><![CDATA[<div>Which of the following statements below are true?</p><p>The <img width="21" height="18" src="$ANGEL:UPLOADPATH$MML/2013/01/17/144710_360836.gif" id="img144710_360836.gif" name="img144710_360836.gif" alt="mathml equation" created="2013/01/18" eq="mathml" fontsize="14" appletheight="36" appletwidth="37" mathml="&lt;math&gt;&lt;mrow&gt;&lt;msub&gt;&lt;mrow&gt;&lt;mi&gt;U&lt;/mi&gt;&lt;mi&gt;O&lt;/mi&gt;&lt;/mrow&gt;&lt;mrow&gt;&lt;mn&gt;2&lt;/mn&gt;&lt;/mrow&gt;&lt;/msub&gt;&lt;/mrow&gt;&lt;/math&gt;" onerror="try { makeMml(this) } catch(e) { }" /> fuel is better than Uranium metallic fuel because:</div>]]><choiceInteraction responseIdentifier="RESPONSE" maxChoices="1" shuffle="False"><simpleChoice identifier="answerChoice1">It has higher thermal conductivity</simpleChoice><simpleChoice identifier="answerChoice2">It survives higher temperatures</simpleChoice><simpleChoice identifier="answerChoice3">Does not experience cracking</simpleChoice></choiceInteraction><![CDATA[<div></div>]]></itemBody><outcomeDeclaration identifier="FEEDBACK" baseType="identifier" baseType="identifier">CORRECT_FEEDBACK</baseValue></setOutcomeValue></responseIf><responseElse><setOutcomeValue identifier="GENERAL_FEEDBACK"><baseValue baseType="identifier">INCORRECT_FEEDBACK</baseValue></setOutcomeValue></responseElse></responseCondition></responseElse></responseCondition></responseProcessing></assessmentItem>

_question._questionText: <div>Which of the following statements below are true?</p><p>One of the important constraints imposed on nuclear fuel implies that:</div><div></div>
_question._qtiXml: <assessmentItem identifier="" title=""><responseDeclaration identifier="RESPONSE" baseType="identifier" cardinality="single"><correctResponse><value>answerChoice2</value></correctResponse><mapping><mapEntry mapKey="answerChoice1" mappedValue="0" /><mapEntry mapKey="answerChoice2" mappedValue="1" /><mapEntry mapKey="answerChoice3" mappedValue="0" /></mapping></responseDeclaration><outcomeDeclaration identifier="SCORE" baseType="float" cardinality="single"><defaultValue><value>0</value></defaultValue></outcomeDeclaration><itemBody><![CDATA[<div>Which of the following statements below are true?</p><p>One of the important constraints imposed on nuclear fuel implies that:</div>]]><choiceInteraction responseIdentifier="RESPONSE" maxChoices="1" shuffle="False"><simpleChoice identifier="answerChoice1">Reactor must be shut down if any fission products are released to the coolant</simpleChoice><simpleChoice identifier="answerChoice2">Some fission products are allowed to be released without causing the reactor to be shut down</simpleChoice><simpleChoice identifier="answerChoice3">Reactor is not shut down nevertheless how many fission products are released to the coolant </simpleChoice></choiceInteraction><![CDATA[<div></div>]]></itemBody><outcomeDeclaration identifier="FEEDBACK" baseType="identifier" cardinality="single" /><outcomeDeclaration identifier="GENERAL_FEEDBACK" baseType="identifier" cardinality="single" /><responseProcessing><setOutcomeValue identifier="FEEDBACK"><variable identifier="RESPONSE" /></setOutcomeValue><responseCondition><responseIf><isNull><variable identifier="RESPONSE" /></isNull><setOutcomeValue identifier="SCORE"><baseValue baseType="integer">0</baseValue></setOutcomeValue></responseIf><responseElse><setOutcomeValue identifier="SCORE"><mapResponse identifier="RESPONSE" /></setOutcomeValue><responseCondition><responseIf><match><correct identifier="RESPONSE" /><variable identifier="RESPONSE" /></match><setOutcomeValue identifier="GENERAL_FEEDBACK"><baseValue baseType="identifier">CORRECT_FEEDBACK</baseValue></setOutcomeValue></responseIf><responseElse><setOutcomeValue identifier="GENERAL_FEEDBACK"><baseValue baseType="identifier">INCORRECT_FEEDBACK</baseValue></setOutcomeValue></responseElse></responseCondition></responseElse></responseCondition></responseProcessing></assessmentItem>

_question._questionText: <div>Which of the following statements below are not true?</p><p>The PWR assembly design is different from BWR because:</div><div></div>

cardinality="single"><correctResponse><value>answerChoice1</value></correctResponse><mapping><mapEntry mapKey="answerChoice1" mappedValue="1" /><mapEntry mapKey="answerChoice2" mappedValue="0" /><mapEntry mapKey="answerChoice3" mappedValue="0" /></mapping></responseDeclaration><outcomeDeclaration identifier="SCORE" baseType="float" cardinality="single"><defaultValue><value>0</value></defaultValue></outcomeDeclaration><itemBody><![CDATA[<div>Which of the following statements below are not true?</p><p>The PWR assembly design is different from BWR because:</div>]]><choiceInteraction responseIdentifier="RESPONSE" maxChoices="1" shuffle="False"><simpleChoice identifier="answerChoice1">It uses different fuel material</simpleChoice><simpleChoice identifier="answerChoice2">It has more pins</simpleChoice><simpleChoice identifier="answerChoice3">It does not have a shroud (it is open _question._questionText: <div>Which of the following statements below are true? </p><p>Zirconium alloys have been chosen as cladding material because:</div><div></div>
_question._qtiXml: <assessmentItem identifier="" title=""><responseDeclaration identifier="RESPONSE" baseType="identifier" cardinality="single"><correctResponse><value>answerChoice3</value></correctResponse><mapping><mapEntry mapKey="answerChoice1" mappedValue="0" /><mapEntry mapKey="answerChoice2" mappedValue="0" /><mapEntry mapKey="answerChoice3" mappedValue="1" /></mapping></responseDeclaration><outcomeDeclaration identifier="SCORE" baseType="float" cardinality="single"><defaultValue><value>0</value></defaultValue></outcomeDeclaration><itemBody><![CDATA[<div>Which of the following statements below are true? </p><p>Zirconium alloys have been chosen as cladding material because:</div>]]><choiceInteraction responseIdentifier="RESPONSE" maxChoices="1" shuffle="False"><simpleChoice identifier="answerChoice1">The radiation damage does not change its properties</simpleChoice><simpleChoice identifier="answerChoice2">It does not experience any corrosion and hydriding</simpleChoice><simpleChoice identifier="answerChoice3">It has very low thermal neutron absorption cross section</simpleChoice></choiceInteraction><![CDATA[<div></div>]]></itemBody><outcomeDeclaration identifier="FEEDBACK" baseType="identifier" cardinality="single" /><outcomeDeclaration identifier="GENERAL_FEEDBACK" baseType="identifier" cardinality="single" /><responseProcessing><setOutcomeValue identifier="FEEDBACK"><variable identifier="RESPONSE" /></setOutcomeValue><responseCondition><responseIf><isNull><variable identifier="RESPONSE" /></isNull><setOutcomeValue identifier="SCORE"><baseValue baseType="integer">0</baseValue></setOutcomeValue></responseIf><responseElse><setOutcomeValue identifier="SCORE"><mapResponse identifier="RESPONSE" /></setOutcomeValue><responseCondition><responseIf><match><correct identifier="RESPONSE" /><variable identifier="RESPONSE" /></match><setOutcomeValue identifier="GENERAL_FEEDBACK"><baseValue baseType="identifier">CORRECT_FEEDBACK</baseValue></setOutcomeValue></responseIf><responseElse><setOutcomeValue identifier="GENERAL_FEEDBACK"><baseValue baseType="identifier">INCORRECT_FEEDBACK</baseValue></setOutcomeValue></responseElse></responseCondition></responseElse></responseCondition></responseProcessing></assessmentItem>
